channel.title: Podcast on Joel Speed
channel.description: Recent content in Podcast on Joel Speed

item.title: The New Stack Context: Kubernetes and Single Sign-On
item.description:
The New Stack kindly invited me to join them for an episode of their Context podcast. Each week they discuss with popular topics with a contributor and get to have a deeper discussion about the contributors work.

This week I discussed my Single Sign-On for Kubernetes blog series.
